output: html_document

```{r}
library(ggplot2)    
library(MASS)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(lme4)
library(effects)
```

Load the fMRI data

```{r}
anFolder = '~/proj/att_awe/analysis/csv/'
file = sprintf('%s/scanData.csv',anFolder)

scanData = read.csv(file)

scanData = scanData %>%
  mutate(task = factor(task,levels=c(1,2),labels=c('Attending Motion','Attending Contrast')),side=factor(side,levels=c(1,2),labels=c('Left','Right')),roi=factor(roi,levels=c(1,2),labels=c('V1','MT')),type=factor(type,levels=c(1,2),labels=c('Coherence','Contrast')))
```

```{r}
ggplot(scanData,aes(pedVal,value,color=task)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="lm",formula=y~x+x^2) +
  facet_grid(roi~type)
```
